column4: How do I use Gnome 3 in fallback mode, and not that Gnome Classic (2.32) look-a-like
Err, Gnome Fallback looks like Gnome Classic.
Yes, it does -- Gnome Shell is what you're looking for
Well, gnome fallback is supposed to look like Gnome 2. Also, you will only get Gnome3 on 11.10 and up, previous versions still have gnome2
You're on an old ubuntu version?
